fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • An article about camps of homeless people being removed by councils said that the number of people living in camps was not recorded in official rough-sleeping statistics. No standalone figures about homeless camps are recorded by the Ministry of Housing, Communities and Local Government, but the statistics aim to include people who bed down in tents and shelters (UK homeless crisis triggers council purge of ‘tent cities’, 18 June, page 1). • Other recently corrected articles include: Only 2% of actors make a living. How do you become one of them? A visual guide to the Gulf tanker attacks On Earth We’re Briefly Gorgeous by Ocean Vuong review – portrait of the artist as a teenager Wendie Renard’s twice-taken penalty pushes France past Nigeria
